record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 10 A.M. TOMORROW
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 10 A.M. TOMORROW -- (Senate - April 14, 2008)

[Page: S2984]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business to come before the Senate, I ask unanimous consent that it stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 6:12 p.m., adjourned until Tuesday, April 15, 2008, at 10 a.m.
